SEARCH
Package hms.system.service

Class QueryFreeTimeslotService

Object
QueryFreeTimeslotService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IService
public class QueryFreeTimeslotService extends Object implements IService
Service for querying free timeslots for the user to select from This service is not meant to be used directly, but rather to be used by other services

    • MINIMUM_APPOINTMENT_DURATION_IN_MINUTES

      private static final int MINIMUM_APPOINTMENT_DURATION_IN_MINUTES
      The minimum duration of an appointment in minutes
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SCHEDULE_PERIOD_START

      private static final int SCHEDULE_PERIOD_START
      The start of the schedule period in days from now.

      The schedule period is the number of days from now that the user can schedule an appointment.

      For example, if the schedule period start is 7, the user can schedule an appointment starting from 7 days from now.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SCHEDULE_PERIOD_END

      private static final int SCHEDULE_PERIOD_END
      The end of the schedule period in days from now.

      The schedule period is the number of days from now that the user can schedule an appointment.

      For example, if the schedule period end is 30, the user can schedule an appointment up to 30 days from now.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • onSelectAppointmentStartTime

      private void onSelectAppointmentStartTime(Date startTime)
      Callback for when the user selects a start time for the appointment. This will prompt the user to select an end time for the appointment.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The selected start time for the appointment

    • onSelectAppointmentEndTime

      private void onSelectAppointmentEndTime(Date endTime)
      Callback for when the user selects an end time for the appointment. This will finalize the process of finding a free timeslot for the appointment and call the callback.
      Parameters:
      endTime - The selected end time for the appointment

    • execute

      public void execute(MenuNavigator menuNav)
      Description copied from interface: IService
      Executes the service. This method is called by the MenuNavigator when the user selects a menu option that corresponds to this service.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface IService
      Parameters:
      menuNav - The MenuNavigator object that called this service.

    • updateFreeTimeslots

      private void updateFreeTimeslots()
      Utility method for updating the freeTimeslots list with the available free timeslots

    • findTimeslotContainingDate

      private Timeslot findTimeslotContainingDate(Date time)
      Utility method for finding the timeslot that contains the selected Date The timeslot is understood as [startTime, endTime)
      Parameters:
      time - The selected time
      Returns:
      The timeslot that contains the selected time

    • calculateWorkingHourTimeslot

      private Timeslot calculateWorkingHourTimeslot(int daysFromNow)
      Utility method for calculating the working hours for a given day which is a number of days from now
      Parameters:
      daysFromNow - The number of days from now, this will be used to calculate the working hours for that day
      Returns:
      The working hours for the given day

    • calculateNextValidTimeslotBoundary

      private Date calculateNextValidTimeslotBoundary(Date current)
      Utility method for calculating the next valid timeslot boundary for the user to select from.

      A timeslot boundary is a time that the user can select for the start time or end time of an appointment.

      Parameters:
      current - The time to calculate the next valid timeslot boundary from
      Returns:
      The next valid timeslot boundary. If the next valid timeslot boundary is after the working hours end, then the next day's working hours start time is returned.

    • calculateAvailableStartTimes

      private List<Date> calculateAvailableStartTimes()
      Utility method for calculating the available start times for the user to select from
      Returns:
      The list of available start times for the user to select from

    • calculateAvailableEndTimes

      private List<Date> calculateAvailableEndTimes()
      Utility method for calculating the available end times for the user to select from
      Returns:
      The list of available end times for the user to select from
